Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Gordon has staked his claim to start for England in Sunday's Euro 2024 last-16 clash with Slovakia, stating that he is a 'nightmare for anyone he plays against'.
Gordon believes that he would add a 'different element' to an England attack that has scored just two goals in three group games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gordon suffered a heavy fall following a high-speed electric bike accident but is fit to feature on Saturday.
